LOL!!!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 10:34 PM
  Subject: Re: [EV=
P-ITC] Different chip config.





  I think "love boobs" is actually "love=
 booze"



  On Fri, May 29, 2009 at 10:32 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealieng=
irl@...> wrote:

    Some from linear sweep. At fisrt I had a strrong=
 sports station, but  in a second recording I turned the antenna to minimiz=
e it. 

     I stick the main recordings in my folder.

     F-S


    On F=
ri, May 29, 2009 at 4:01 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostresea=
rch.com> wrote:





      I meant I didn't know if this particular one had=
 changed. I was laughing at what it said :)

        ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
        From: Frank Sumption 
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
=
        Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 2:44 PM
        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] D=
ifferent chip config.



        I know they can change, I've had them answ=
er live off a pre-recorded tape.

         F-S


        On Fri, May 29, 20=
09 at 2:32 PM, April Abercrombie <april@...> wrote=
:





          LOL!! I don't know.

            ----- Original Message --=
--- 
            From: Frank Sumption 
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com 
            Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 2:12 PM
            Subject: Re=
: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config. [1 Attachment]



             At about =
10 seconds "chris makes riches off this"? So was that there at the time of =
recording or does it get changed?

             F-S


            On Fri, M=
ay 29, 2009 at 8:01 AM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostresearch.c=
om> wrote:





              If you let him that is.

                ----=
- Original Message ----- 
                From: April Abercrombie 
        =
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Friday, May 29, =
2009 8:00 AM
                Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.
=



                I think the bottom line is we all know that Chris Moon i=
s probably just trying to use you. He'll suck you dry and toss you aside wh=
en he gets his fill.

                  ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
             From: Fransen, Debbie 
                  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
                  Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 7:45 AM
              =
    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.



                  Exac=
tly my point... You don't charge anything for the boxes
                  a=
nd Chris Moon charges people for using it....
                  If it's not=
 perfected then Chris shouldn't charge either......
                  If he=
 wasn't so public with it, then people like me wouldn't dislike him so much=
.

                  The only people that have your boxes (that the public =
hear about)
                  are the well known paranormal groups and famo=
us people.
                  I am sure that you have given boxes to researc=
hers who are not in the popular
                  paranormal community ,and=
 don't want to be. Those are the ones that should
                  get res=
pect.  And of course YOU are well respected by us lowly researchers. ( Kiss=
in up , so you won't get mad)

                  And I am sure that you are=
 sick of hearing about Chris Moon and how
                  alot of people =
thinks he sucks. And everyone wants a box......
                  But you h=
ave to expect that. You are the only one out there that is honest and
     =
             doesn't want to be famous.
                  I know this is li=
ke beating a dead horse, so I will shut up now.... :)





----------------=
----------------------------------------------
                  From: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Frank Sum=
ption
                  Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 9:22 AM
                =
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
                  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Diff=
erent chip config.



                   Keep in mind the money thing works=
 two ways, I also don't sell/charge for the boxes. Someday I will--when it'=
s perfected!

                   Frank-S


                  On Fri, May 29=
, 2009 at 6:16 AM, Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:





 =
                   Of course Chris Moon speaks highly of him.
             =
       Frank has made him lots of money.



-------------------------------=
-----------------------------
                    From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Elaine Coates
          =
          Sent: Thursday, May 28, 2009 3:49 PM 

                    To: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com

                    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different=
 chip config.




                    Okay, then could I have a copy of the=
 new schematic when you get it drawn?  That would be even better.  Where ar=
e you from?  Chris Moon speaks highly of you.




-------------------------=
-----------------------------------
                    From: Frank Sumptio=
n <purplealiengirl@...>
                    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om
                    Sent: Thursday, May 28, 2009 2:29:09 PM
            =
        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.


                   =
 Besides--I didn't like that radio design, it's too complex, and the docume=
ntation is screwy. I did a simpler radio last night that should be better, =
simpler, cheaper, and clearer sound. 



                    On Thu, May 28=
, 2009 at 5:41 AM, Elaine Coates <cozykat2003@ yahoo.com> wrote:





     =
                 The jpg for this schematic is kind of blurry in places.  I=
s there any way a more clear copy could be send to me? I would be forever g=
rateful.  Thanks Frank - Elaine




---------------------------------------=
-------------------
                      From: Frank Sumption <purplealien=
girl@ gmail.com>

                      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
      =
                Sent: Thursday, May 28, 2009 12:55:00 AM
                  =
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.



                      =
http://purplealieng irl.tripod. com/ 

                       However, it's=
 constantly changing. The radio I made tonight is very simple, and can sign=
ificantly simplify construction. I used to make the sweep and amplifier cir=
cuits, then use a commercial radio, like the 12-469, as a tuner. 

        =
               The MK484 is follwed by a couple high impedence op amp stage=
s to bring the audio up to line levels. I haven't had time to do schematic =
yet. I draw the schematics with MS paint, and they are stored as jpeg image=
s, which isn't the best, but it makes them e-mailable. 

                  =
     Frank-S


                      On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 8:54 PM, Elain=
e Coates <cozykat2003@ yahoo.com> wrote:





                        Hi fo=
lks, I just joined this group.  I was recently at the Lizzy Borden house in=
 Massachusetts with Chris Moon and had a session with Frank's Box.  The res=
ults were astounding.  Is this the newest schematic for Frank's box?  If so=
, is there a way to get a clearer copy of it?  My son said he would build o=
ne for me and I have been searching for the schematic.  Can anyone help? - =
Elaine




--------------------------------------------------------
       =
                 From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>

       =
                 To: evp-itc@yahoogroups .com; grassharp@yahoogrou ps.com 
=

                        Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 5:45:16 PM
         =
               Subject: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config. [1 Attachment]



=

                         I think I followed an erroneous LM3820 layout, so=
 I'm going to breadboard this layout. Note the antenna input is now on pin =
12-11, this is the RF amp input, and pin 13 is the RF amp output, which fee=
ds pin 1.

                         'case anyone cares. 

                 =
        F-S































































=
